dcterms:creator: Nathan Silberman
Derek Hoiem
Pushmeet Kohli
Rob Fergus
dcterms:description: NYU-Depth V2 is the most authoritative and widely used benchmark dataset for depth image completion, containing 408,473 images collected in 464 different indoor scenes, and 1449 officially labeled images for evaluation.
dcterms:title: NYU-Depth V2

dcterms:creator: Jaehoon Cho
Dongbo Min
Youngjung Kim
Kwanghoon Sohn
dcterms:description: DIML is a recently introduced dataset of 2 million images captured in diverse indoor and outdoor settings, including images with typical edge shadows and irregular holes, providing a robust evaluation benchmark for assessing the adaptability of models to various invalid patterns.
dcterms:title: DIML

dcterms:creator: Shuran Song
Samuel P. Lichtenberg
Jianxiong Xiao
dcterms:description: SUN RGB-D is an extensive dataset comprising 10,335 densely captured RGB-D images obtained from four different sensors, covering 19 primary scene categories, providing a diverse range of scenes for evaluation.
dcterms:title: SUN RGB-D
